text: おい、見たかよ / 見た、見た / 何が? / 知らねえのか、あの外人 / 外人? / ああ、2年A組に転校してきたんだよ / 先週
translation: Hey, did you see her? / Yeah, yeah / See what? / Don't you know? That foreigner / Foreigner? / Yeah, she transferred to class 2-A / Last week
grammar: かよ - masculine informal question particle showing surprise or seeking confirmation

text: グー / だよな
translation: Nice / Right?
grammar: だよな - seeking agreement, masculine casual speech

text: ソウリュウアスカラングレって言うんだってさ / マジに可愛いじゃ / 帰国子女だろ / やっぱ住んでんのかな / バカ言え
translation: They say her name is Soryu Asuka Langley / She's seriously cute / She's a returnee, right? / I wonder if she really lives there / Don't be stupid

vocabulary.meaning: person who grew up abroad, returnee
as expected, after all (casual form of やはり)

grammar: って言うんだってさ - hearsay marker (I heard that...); んだ - explanatory んです in casual form

text: きっとドイツでつらい別れがあったんだ / 見知らぬ土地で傷ついた心も癒せずにいるんだよ / お / ー
translation: She must have had a painful separation in Germany / In an unfamiliar land, unable to heal her wounded heart / Oh...

vocabulary.meaning: to be wounded, to be hurt

grammar: んだ - explanatory form expressing conjecture; ずにいる - continuing state of not doing something

text: あーあー / 猫もシャクシも / アスカ。アスカか? / 皆平和なもんや。 / 前取り!
translation: Geez... / Every Tom, Dick, and Harry / Asuka. Asuka, huh? / Everyone's so carefree. / Front and center!

vocabulary.meaning: every Tom, Dick, and Harry; everyone without exception

grammar: もんや - Kansai dialect explanatory ending (standard: ものだ)

text: 写真にあの性格はあらへんからな。
translation: A photo doesn't show that personality of hers.

vocabulary.meaning: doesn't exist (Kansai dialect for ない)

grammar: あらへん - Kansai dialect negative (standard: ない); からな - explanatory with emphasis

text: ヘロー!シンジ! / ゴーテン・モーゲン!
translation: Hello! Shinji! / Guten Morgen!
grammar: Katakana used for foreign words (English 'Hello' and German 'Guten Morgen')

text: ゴ、ゴーテン・モーゲン… / また朝から新規くさい顔して、このあたしが声かけてんのよ。 / ジッターうれしそうな顔しなさいよ。
translation: G-Guten Morgen... / Once again, with that gloomy face in the morning, and I'm the one greeting you. / You should at least look happy.
grammar: てんのよ - contracted form of ているのよ (continuous action + feminine emphasis); しなさいよ - imperative + feminine particle

text: で、ここにいるんでしょ?もう一人 / 誰が?
translation: So, she's here, right? The other one / Who?

vocabulary.meaning: one more person, the other person

grammar: んでしょ - contracted form of のでしょう (seeking confirmation)

text: あんたバカ?ファーストチルドレーに決まってるじゃない / ああ、綾波なら
translation: Are you stupid? It's obviously the First Children / Oh, if you mean Ayanami...

vocabulary.word: ファーストチルドレー
vocabulary.reading: ふぁーすとちるどれー

grammar: に決まってるじゃない - it's obviously..., it must be... (strong assertion)

text: ハロー! / あなたが綾波レイね、プロトタイプのパイロット
translation: Hello! / You're Ayanami Rei, right? The prototype's pilot
grammar: ね - sentence-final particle seeking confirmation or agreement

text: 私、アスカ、双流アスカラングレー / エヴァ2号機のパイロット / 仲良くしましょう / どうして? / その方が都合がいいからよ / いろいろとね
translation: I'm Asuka, Soryu Asuka Langley / Pilot of Eva Unit-02 / Let's be friends / Why? / Because it's more convenient that way / In various ways
grammar: しましょう - volitional form (let's...); 方が - comparative (more...)

text: 命令があればそうするわ / 変わったかねえ / ほんま、エヴァのパイロットって / 変わり者が選ばれるんちゃうか?
translation: If there's an order, I'll do so / She's odd, isn't she? / Seriously, Eva pilots... / Aren't they all weirdos who get selected?

vocabulary.meaning: to be chosen, to be selected
isn't it? (Kansai dialect for じゃないか)

grammar: があれば - conditional (if there is...); んちゃうか - Kansai dialect conjecture (standard: のではないか)

text: 少し痩せたかな / そう / 悲しい恋をしてるからだ / どうして / そんなことがわかるの
translation: Have you lost a little weight? / Really? / It's because you're having a sad romance / How do you / know something like that?

vocabulary.meaning: to lose weight, to become thin

grammar: たかな - past tense + かな (wondering if...); からだ - explanatory (it's because...)

text: それはね / 涙の通り道にほくろのある人は
translation: Well, you see / People who have a mole on the path of tears...
grammar: それはね - explanatory opening (well, you see...); にある - existence at a location

text: 一生泣き続ける運命にあるからだよ / これからくどくつもり / でもダメよ / 怖い お姉さんが見ているわ
translation: ...are destined to cry for their entire lives / Are you planning to hit on her now? / But that's no good / A scary big sister is watching

vocabulary.meaning: to court, to woo, to hit on

grammar: にある - to be in a state of; つもり - intention (planning to...)

text: お久しぶり カジ君 / いや しばらく
translation: Long time no see, Kaji-kun / Yeah, it's been a while
grammar: お久しぶり - polite greeting for meeting after a long time (full form: お久しぶりです)

text: しかし カジ君も意外とうかつね / こいつのバカは相変わらずなのよ / あんた 2号機の引き渡し済んだんなら さっさと帰りなさいよ / 今朝 執行の事例が届いたね
translation: However, Kaji-kun, you're surprisingly careless / This idiot is as foolish as ever / If you've finished the Unit-02 handover, hurry up and go home / The assignment notice arrived this morning
grammar: 済んだんなら - conditional (if...has finished); さっさと - quickly, hurriedly (onomatopoeia)

text: ここに居続けだよ / また3人でつるめるな / 昔みたいに / 誰があんたなんかと / 敵襲!?
translation: I'll be staying here / We can hang out together again, the three of us / Just like the old days / Who would hang out with you? / Enemy attack!?

vocabulary.meaning: to hang out together, to stick together

grammar: 続ける - continuation verb; みたいに - like, similar to; なんかと - dismissive particle (with someone like...)

text: 警戒中の巡洋艦、春名寄りに入電。我、キー半島を聞いて巨大な閃光物体を発見。データを送る。 / 受信データを称号。波長パターン青。湿度確認。
translation: Message from patrol cruiser Haruna. Detected massive luminescent object approaching Kii Peninsula. Sending data. / Analyzing received data. Wave pattern blue. Confirming Angel.
grammar: 中の - in the middle of (doing); を聞いて - te-form of 聞く used for sequential action

text: 総員、第一種戦闘配置。
translation: All hands, battle stations first class.
grammar: Military command structure - noun phrases without particles for brevity

text: さきの戦闘によって第三神闘教師の迎撃システムは大きなダメージを受け
translation: Due to the previous battle, Tokyo-3's intercept system suffered major damage
grammar: によって - by means of, due to; を受け - te-form of 受ける (to receive)

text: 現在までの復旧率は26% / 実戦における稼働率はゼロと言っていいわ
translation: Recovery rate to date is 26% / The operational rate in actual combat can be said to be zero
grammar: における - in, at (formal); と言っていい - can say that, it's fair to say

text: したがって今回は上陸直前の目標を水際で一気に叩く
translation: Therefore, this time we'll strike the target at the water's edge in one blow just before it lands
grammar: 直前の - immediately before; で - location particle; に - adverbial particle with 一気

text: 初号機並びに2号機は交互に目標に対し波状攻撃 / 近接戦闘で行くわよ / 了解
translation: Unit-01 and Unit-02 will conduct alternating wave attacks against the target / We'll go with close combat / Roger
grammar: に対し - toward, against; で行く - to go with, to proceed with
